entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
